address2: 7th Floor, Eastwood City CyberPark 188 E. Rodriguez Jr. Avenue Bagumbayan
longBusinessSummary: Alliance Global Group, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development, tourism-entertainment and gaming, food and beverage, quick-service restaurant, and integrated tourism and infrastructure development businesses in the Philippines and internationally. It operates through Megaworld, Emperador, Travellers, and GADC segments. The company develops residential condominium units, subdivision lots, and townhouses, as well as office and retail space; sells real estate residential properties; develops integrated resorts; leases office and retail spaces; and manages hotels. It also develops and operates Newport World Resorts, an integrated tourism resort; and operates NEWPORT mall and Newport Cinemas. In addition, the company produces glass containers; and manufactures, bottles, and distributes distilled spirits and other alcoholic beverages under the Emperador Light, Emperador Deluxe, Andy Player Whisky, So Nice, Fruity Mix, Smirnoff Mule, The BaR, Charles & James Light, Zabana Philippine Rum, Ernest and Julio Gallo wines, Terry Centenario, Tres Cepas, Harveys, Harveys Aperitivo, Vermut Marinero, Presidente, Presidente Light, Don Pedro, Azteca De Oro, Scotch whisky, The Dalmore Single Malt Scotch Whisky, The Dalmore Quintessence, Jura Single Malt Scotch Whisky, Jura 12 Years, Tamnavulin Single Malt Scotch whisky, Fettercairn, Fettercairn 22 Years Old, Whyte and Mackay and Woodsman Blended Scotch Whisky, Shackleton, John Barr, Cluny and Claymore, Glayva, and Fundador brand names. Further, the company operates franchised McDonald's restaurants in the Philippines. Additionally, it distributes wines, whisky and brandy products; and shoestring potato snacks under Pik-Nik brand name. Alliance Global Group, Inc. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Quezon City, the Philippines.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Dina D. R. Inting
companyOfficers.title: CFO, Compliance Officer & Corporate Information Officer
